portfolio.experience: Young English-speaking guide focused on design, crafts, and women-led entrepreneurship.
portfolio.bio: Sara curates Cairo through its creative subcultures—makers, illustrators, textile revivals, and café labs. She threads historic districts with new creative hubs, explaining how craft lineages survive and adapt. Her tours feel like a residency: you meet people behind the storefronts and leave with favorite addresses. She’s pragmatic about safety and transport for solo travelers.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: Introduced us to artisans we’d never find alone.
Balanced history with living culture—loved it.

portfolio.experience: Mandarin-speaking guide building bridges for first-time visitors from East Asia.
portfolio.bio: Mona studied Chinese linguistics and uses clear, friendly Mandarin that puts guests at ease. She explains ticketing and tipping culture transparently and shares food tips that respect dietary preferences. Her routes emphasize comfort—rest stops, shaded viewpoints, and smart pacing—without compromising on signature sites. She’s patient, upbeat, and detail-oriented.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: Professional and thoughtful; my parents felt very comfortable.
Clear Mandarin explanations and great photo spots.

portfolio.experience: Spanish-speaking guide with a literature background and love for storytelling.
portfolio.bio: Fatma tells Egypt’s story through voices often missing from the canon—craftswomen, travelers, and chroniclers. Her tours are anchored by sensory details: spices, music, textiles. She adjusts tempo for multi-generational groups and coaches guests on bargaining that respects artisans. People remember her for turning plazas into open-air libraries.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: Her stories made every stone feel alive.
Learned how to shop respectfully and confidently.
highlight_tours: Sabores de El Cairo – Ruta Gastronómica

portfolio.experience: English guide with interest in sacred sites and music culture.
portfolio.bio: Mary’s routes are contemplative without being solemn. She balances theological context with human stories—pilgrims, scholars, and everyday worshippers. Between churches and mosques, she weaves in music history and contemporary practice. Her groups appreciate her grace under pressure and her talent for making silence part of the itinerary.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: Thoughtful, respectful, and deeply knowledgeable.
She found quiet corners I’d never have noticed.
highlight_tours: City of a Thousand Minarets Walk

portfolio.experience: Spanish-speaking guide passionate about contemporary neighborhoods and markets.
portfolio.bio: Engy brings a gentle, curious energy to every group. She uses markets as living classrooms—for language, customs, and micro-economies. Her itineraries are perfect for travelers who want equal parts headline sites and neighborhood texture. Expect good coffee, good company, and great pacing.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: Felt like walking with a friend who knows everyone.
Balanced big sites with cozy local stops.

portfolio.experience: French-language expert with premium small-group curation.
portfolio.bio: Mai tailors refined experiences for Francophone travelers who appreciate nuance. She balances grand monuments with ateliers, salons, and chef-led tastings. Her commentary moves gracefully between archaeology and aesthetics, always attentive to guest comfort and rhythm. Think quiet courtyards, great coffee, and doors that seem to open just for you.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: D’une élégance rare, et d’une précision impeccable.
Des adresses confidentielles et des rencontres mémorables.

portfolio.experience: Up-and-coming Mandarin guide for small groups and first-time visitors.
portfolio.bio: Ebtihal’s tours are friendly, structured, and photogenic. She sets clear expectations in Mandarin, offers gentle bargaining guidance, and keeps rest stops thoughtful. She’s great for families, exchange students, and travelers who want guidance without pressure.

reviews: 中文沟通无障碍，服务细致。

portfolio.experience: Turkish-language guide building Egypt–Anatolia cultural bridges.
portfolio.bio: Rowan crafts intuitive itineraries for Turkish guests, leaning into shared culinary and artistic threads. She’s transparent about pricing and etiquette, which lowers stress around shopping and tipping. Her commentary keeps the big picture in view without losing charming details.

reviews: Türkçe anlatımı akıcı ve çok netti.

portfolio.experience: Mandarin guide focused on museum clarity and shopping assistance.
portfolio.bio: Fatma delivers concise, well-structured Mandarin commentary, ideal for first-time museum visitors. She pilots guests through ticketing, rest stops, and photo timing with care. Her gentle manner makes families and seniors feel secure and unhurried.

reviews: 讲解清晰，行程舒适。
贴心安排，购物建议很实用。

portfolio.experience: Mandarin-speaking guide with foodie focus and curated shopping.
portfolio.bio: Noha treats the city as a tasting menu. From sesame halva to mint tea on breezy rooftops, she pairs bites with stories and historical context. She keeps groups small to protect quality and ensures vendors are fairly compensated.

reviews: 吃得好，学得多，拍得美。

portfolio.experience: Czech-language guide supporting first-time visitors and student groups.
portfolio.bio: Nancy překládá Egypt do češtiny s lehkostí a úsměvem. Šikovně vysvětluje praktika—spropitné, smlouvání, vstupy—aby se hosté cítili jistě. Má smysl pro tempo a krátké pauzy, takže i horký den je příjemný a přehledný.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: Skvělé tempo a jasné informace.
Dostali jsme tipy, které nám ušetřily čas i peníze.

portfolio.experience: 25+ years guiding German-speaking travelers across Egypt with deep focus on Pharaonic history and Nile itineraries.
portfolio.bio: Mohamed blends academic rigor with a storyteller’s instinct. He began as a museum docent and grew into a sought-after guide for German embassies and cultural institutes. Guests praise his ability to decode inscriptions and place each monument in its broader historical arc. Between temples he threads in contemporary life—coffee rituals, artisan workshops, and neighborhood anecdotes—so travelers leave with a layered sense of Egypt.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: His Luxor explanations were like attending a masterclass—clear, vivid, unforgettable.
Flawless logistics and a warm presence; we felt like honored guests everywhere.

portfolio.experience: Multilingual guide specializing in Mediterranean cultures and cross-cultural groups.
portfolio.bio: Hassan’s tours are choreographed like a great conversation—curious, dynamic, and inclusive. Having studied comparative literature, he maps myths and language roots to sites and neighborhoods. He is equally at home negotiating with market vendors or interpreting medieval manuscripts. His guests consistently highlight his ease in three languages and his knack for keeping groups engaged across generations.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: Our teens and grandparents were equally captivated—no small feat!
Seamless in Spanish, charming in English, and superb recommendations for food.

portfolio.experience: Early-career German guide with strong grounding in modern Egyptology and youth groups.
portfolio.bio: Hassan brings a fresh lens to classics: he pairs Old Kingdom context with modern design, music, and media. He studied Egyptology and public history, which shows in his crisp narratives and interactive prompts. Expect QR-code mini-activities, map overlays, and playful debates on conservation vs. access. He’s especially popular with student and young professional groups.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: He turned the museum into a living puzzle—smart and fun.
Great pacing and fresh insights; our students learned a ton.

portfolio.experience: Energetic English-speaking guide focused on city culture and ancient-modern bridges.
portfolio.bio: Youssef designs days that feel like time-travel with snacks. He’s a connector—between neighborhoods, eras, and people—linking pharaohs to pop culture with easy humor. He keeps logistics light, so small groups glide from metro rides to rooftop views. Guests value his safety mindset and his knack for reading group energy.

reviews: We tasted, laughed, and learned—perfect balance.
Felt like touring with a savvy local friend.

portfolio.experience: 20+ years creating tailored journeys for families and corporate travelers.
portfolio.bio: Adel is a calm hand on complex itineraries. He reads the hidden schedule of cities—when crowds thin, when light is best, when a quiet tea house can reset the day. His approach is meticulous without being rigid, and he’s known for looking after details guests didn’t know they needed taken care of. Under his guidance, Egypt feels both grand and effortless.

reviews: Everything worked like clockwork without feeling rushed.
Our kids adored him and learned so much on site.

portfolio.experience: Adventure-leaning English guide with desert expertise and off-the-beaten-path flair.
portfolio.bio: Tamer designs journeys that breathe—long horizons, starlit dinners, and sober respect for desert safety. He partners with local Bedouin teams to keep experiences authentic and equitable. When he’s not plotting dune lines, he’s pointing out desert flora and the archaeology of ‘empty’ spaces. His city days are crisp; his desert nights are unforgettable.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: We saw the Milky Way like a ribbon—safe and magical.
Expert driver and a great storyteller around the campfire.

portfolio.experience: English guide focused on first-timers, smart pacing, and iconic photo setups.
portfolio.bio: Omar’s tours prioritize clarity and comfort. He front-loads context so sites ‘click’ upon arrival, then leaves space for awe and photos. He keeps a library of vantage points for crowd-free shots and knows when to pivot if lines swell. Guests describe him as organized, good-humored, and unflappable.

reviews: He anticipated every question before we asked.
Best trip photos of our vacation, hands down.

portfolio.experience: Early-career Spanish guide focusing on student and backpacker segments.
portfolio.bio: Ehab designs nimble itineraries for travelers who value value—yes, double value. He keeps transit intuitive, using metro and ride-hails to stretch budgets without sacrificing must-see sites. He’s upbeat, pragmatic, and quick with safety pointers and local hacks. Great for first-time Spanish-speaking visitors.

reviews: Packed so much into one day without stress.
Super helpful tips for using public transport.

portfolio.experience: Spanish guide focused on classic archaeology with crisp, visual storytelling.
portfolio.bio: Mohamed loves diagrams and ground plans, and it shows. He simplifies complex time periods into memory-friendly narratives, then ties artifacts to architectural moments on site. His groups appreciate the clarity, the pacing, and the neatly planned break stops.
certifications: Licensed Tour Guide – Ministry of Tourism

reviews: Crystal-clear explanations and perfect timing at viewpoints.

portfolio.experience: Veteran Mandarin guide with deep partner network for groups and MICE.

reviews: We finally understood why iconography matters.

portfolio.experience: German guide with focus on photography and active sightseeing.

reviews: My best Cairo photos came from his route.

portfolio.experience: Spanish-language guide with interest in film, architecture, and urban history.

reviews: Una mirada cinematográfica de la ciudad—preciosa.

portfolio.experience: English guide for small groups, faith sites, and people-centric storytelling.

He balances must-see monuments with serendipity: a bakery with ancient techniques, a courtyard with perfect acoustics. Guests describe his style as warm, attentive, and quietly witty.

reviews: Felt cared for and seen as individuals.

portfolio.experience: Bilingual guide for active travelers and quick-turn highlights.
